1011110011101000 1011111110000010 0 -> sum: 0111110001101010, cout: 1

0101011110100000 1101110011011100 0 -> sum: 0011010001111100, cout: 1

0011000011111000 0110010000000010 1 -> sum: 1001010011111011, cout: 0
0101101101001111 1011110010111110 0 -> sum: 0001100000001101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
